items.title: Premium Brands
items.name: Emma Newman
items.text: We've got a long list of the finest liquor and beer brands, with each selection going through incredible care for its mind-blowing taste and very high quality.

items.title: Delicious Mixers
items.name: Viktoria Freeman
items.text: Enhance your drink with our curated selection of delicious mixers. If you feel like having a traditional cocktail or a drink with a twist, our mixers are made to go together with our premium spirits, and you can be sure to have a perfect pour every time.

items.title: Tap Room Special Meals
items.name: Paul Trueman
items.text: Discover the perfect pairing for your favorite drink with our Tap Room Special Meals! Indulge in a delightful selection of hearty dishes expertly matched with the ideal beverage.

items.title: Local Favorites
items.name: Paul Trueman
items.text: We take pride in celebrating the flavors of our region with our selection of local brews and dishes. It’s a tribute to the rich culinary heritage that makes our Tap Room feel like home.

items.title: Seasonal Selections
items.name: Paul Trueman
items.text: Delight in our rotating seasonal offerings that showcase the best of each time of year. From refreshing summer cocktails to hearty winter brews, our seasonal selections ensure there’s always something new and exciting to try.
